name: argyle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pattern used on items of clothing such as socks or sweaters, consisting of diamond shapes of various colours: This argyle V-neck sweater is a classic piece of golf clothing.
subjug/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
